channel.title: almost-surely on Trang Bui
channel.description: Recent content in almost-surely on Trang Bui

item.description: Trang Bui I am a first-year PhD student in Statistics at University of Waterloo. My research interest lies in Statistical Learning and Statistical Modelling. I am working with Professor Stefan Steiner and Professor Nathaniel Stevens on Network Statistics problems. I completed my undergraduate studies in Mathematical Sciences and Business Manangement at Korean Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST). I am inspired by art, music and languanges.
